con:testSuite.name: Test Suite fails if we don't get faults
con:testSuite.con:description:
This is a complementary Test Suite that illustrates something important.
Do not only test that your Web Service works under the right conditions, also test that it work under the wrong ones.
One of the strengths of ReadyAPI Test is the ability do quickly create a number of destructive tests, that confirms that the your Web Service handles input errors, abuse, input faults etc. correctly.
